name: MLPCCG-OCTGN
tagline: My Little Pony Collectible Card Game Plugin for OCTGN
body:
My Little Pony Collectible Card Game by Enterplay.

This is a game definition for the [Online Card and Tabletop Gaming Network (OCTGN)](http://octgn.net).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
